title: My Secret
description: Tony was finally getting away for a camping holiday with his best bud, Paul. Being a bit fearful of wild animals, but convinced by his friend they’d have a safe and wonderful time, Tony arrived at the campground with an open mind.Little did he realize an untamed ’something’ had its sinister eye on him…and the most terrifying, insane, sexual escapade he could ever imagine, was about to happen.
author: Mallory West
